overview: x265 is an open-source HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) encoder that enables efficient video compression for high-quality, high-resolution video content. It provides advanced encoding features and optimizations for achieving significant bitrate reduction while maintaining visual quality, making it suitable for various multimedia applications.
core_features: HEVC/H.265 video encoding with high compression efficiency
Optimized bitrate control and quality settings
Support for various coding tools and optimization techniques
Integration with encoding workflows and multimedia applications
